title: Elegant Parisian Apartment near Eiffel Tower

reviews.text: Amazing location and beautiful apartment. Marie was very helpful!
Perfect stay in Paris. The view of the Eiffel Tower is stunning.
Great apartment, well equipped kitchen. Slightly noisy at night.
Couldn't have asked for a better place to stay in Paris!
Marie is an excellent host. Apartment was spotless.
Lovely place, great location. Would definitely come back.
Everything was perfect. The apartment has all you need.

description: Experience Paris like a local in this elegantly renovated apartment just steps from the Eiffel Tower. The space features high ceilings, original hardwood floors, and modern amenities. Wake up to stunning city views and enjoy your morning coffee on the charming balcony.

title: Cozy Studio in Le Marais

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 5 days before

reviews.text: Perfect location for exploring Paris on foot!
Cozy and clean. Great cafes nearby.
Loved staying here. Pierre was very responsive.
Great value for the location. Would book again.
Nice studio, a bit small but perfect for a couple.
Excellent location in the heart of Le Marais.
Charming studio with everything you need.

description: Charming studio apartment in the heart of Le Marais, one of Paris's most vibrant neighborhoods. Surrounded by boutiques, galleries, and excellent restaurants. The apartment is bright, modern, and has everything you need for a comfortable stay.

title: Modern Loft in Shoreditch

reviews.text: Fantastic loft! Great for remote work.
Stylish space in a great location.
Modern and clean. Shoreditch is so vibrant!
James was an excellent host. Highly recommend!
Perfect base for exploring East London.
Loved the industrial design. Great coffee shops nearby.
One of the best Airbnbs I've stayed in.
Exactly as pictured. Would stay again!

description: Industrial-chic loft apartment in the heart of Shoreditch, London's creative hub. Features exposed brick walls, high ceilings, and a dedicated workspace. Perfect for creatives and remote workers looking to be inspired by the neighborhood's street art and coffee culture.

title: Charming House in Notting Hill

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 7 days before

reviews.text: Beautiful home in the most picturesque neighborhood!
Perfect for families. Charlotte thought of everything.
Loved waking up to the colorful houses!
Great house, very spacious. Portobello Market is amazing.
A dream come true! Just like in the movies.
We didn't want to leave! Such a special place.

description: Step into this charming Victorian townhouse in the heart of Notting Hill. Featuring original period details, a private garden, and modern comforts. Walk to Portobello Road Market, Hyde Park, and some of London's best restaurants.

title: Canal View Apartment in Jordaan

reviews.text: The canal view is even better in person!
Perfect Amsterdam experience. Jan is a great host.
Lovely apartment. Stairs are steep but that's typical for Amsterdam!
Best location in Amsterdam. Highly recommend!
Magical place! We loved every moment.
Exactly what you'd expect from a classic Amsterdam apartment.
Great stay! The neighborhood is beautiful.

description: Authentic Amsterdam apartment overlooking the beautiful Prinsengracht canal in the charming Jordaan neighborhood. Large windows flood the space with natural light. Perfect base for exploring the city by foot or bike.

title: Houseboat Experience on Amstel

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 5 days before

reviews.text: Absolutely unique experience! The gentle rocking is so relaxing.
Best part of our Amsterdam trip!
Marieke made us feel so welcome. Loved the houseboat life!
A must-do in Amsterdam! So cozy and romantic.
Unique and beautiful. Photos don't do it justice!
Great experience, compact but has everything you need.
Waking up on the water was magical!

description: Live the Dutch dream on this beautifully renovated houseboat on the Amstel River. Fall asleep to the gentle motion of the water and wake up to ducks swimming past your window. A truly unique Amsterdam experience.

title: Sunny Apartment in Gothic Quarter

reviews.text: Great apartment, very central. Can hear some street noise.
Carlos was super helpful with local recommendations!
Good value for the Gothic Quarter location.
Loved the balcony and the natural light!
Nice apartment, we had a great stay.

description: Bright and airy apartment in a historic building in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter. Original stone walls meet modern design. Steps from the Cathedral, La Rambla, and the best tapas bars in the city. AC keeps you cool in summer.

title: Beach House in Barceloneta

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 7 days before

reviews.text: Best beach house ever! The pool was amazing.
Isabella is the best host! Perfect for families.
Great location, just steps from the beach.
We didn't want to leave! Amazing property.
The rooftop terrace has incredible views!
Great house, well equipped. Highly recommend.

description: Stunning beach house just 100 meters from Barceloneta Beach. Features a private rooftop terrace with plunge pool and Mediterranean views. The perfect base for a beach holiday in Barcelona with all the city's attractions nearby.

title: Historic Apartment near Colosseum

reviews.text: Waking up near the Colosseum is surreal!
Giuseppe is an amazing host with great recommendations.
The Monti neighborhood is so charming!
Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

description: Beautifully restored apartment in a 16th-century building in the trendy Monti neighborhood. Just a 5-minute walk to the Colosseum. High ceilings, terracotta floors, and all modern comforts. Experience la dolce vita!

title: Luxury Suite near Vatican

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 3 days before

reviews.text: Perfect location for visiting the Vatican.
Luxury at its finest. Highly recommend.

description: Indulge in luxury at this boutique hotel suite steps from the Vatican. Marble bathrooms, premium linens, and personalized service. Daily breakfast included. The perfect romantic getaway in the Eternal City.

title: Alfama Terrace with River Views

reviews.text: The terrace view is absolutely stunning!
Joana is a wonderful host. Perfect location!
Charming apartment in the heart of Alfama.
We loved hearing fado at night from the terrace.

description: Cozy apartment in historic Alfama with a private terrace overlooking the Tagus River. Listen to fado drifting up from the narrow streets below. Recently renovated with traditional azulejo tiles preserved.

title: Design Loft in LX Factory

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 5 days before

reviews.text: LX Factory is incredible. Perfect location.
The Sunday market is so fun!

description: Stunning designer loft in a converted factory building in trendy LX Factory. Exposed brick, soaring ceilings, and curated furniture. Steps from the best brunch spots, vintage shops, and creative studios in Lisbon.

title: Art Nouveau Gem in Old Town

reviews.text: The Art Nouveau details are breathtaking!
Petra is an excellent host. Great communication.
Like staying in a museum! In the best way.
The stained glass windows are stunning!
Great value for Old Town location.

description: Step back in time in this lovingly preserved Art Nouveau apartment just steps from Old Town Square. Original stained glass, ornate moldings, and period furniture transport you to Prague's golden age while enjoying modern amenities.

title: Riverside Penthouse with Castle Views

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 5 days before

reviews.text: The castle view at sunset is unforgettable!
Best views in Prague, hands down.
We extended our stay - it's that good!
Worth every penny for these views.

description: Exceptional penthouse apartment overlooking the Vltava River with panoramic views of Prague Castle. Floor-to-ceiling windows, modern Scandinavian design, and a wraparound terrace. Watch the city lights twinkle from your private rooftop.

title: Kreuzberg Artist Loft

reviews.text: Loved the artsy vibe. Great neighborhood.
Great space, excellent location for nightlife.
Street art everywhere! Love this area.

description: Immerse yourself in Berlin's creative heart with this spacious artist loft in Kreuzberg. High ceilings, original artwork, and industrial details. Surrounded by street art, independent cafes, and the city's best nightlife.

title: Minimalist Studio in Mitte

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 3 days before

reviews.text: Best designed Airbnb I've stayed in.
Great for business travel. Excellent wifi.
Everything you need, nothing you don't.
Will book again on next Berlin trip.

description: Clean lines and thoughtful design define this minimalist studio in the heart of Mitte. Japanese-inspired aesthetic with quality materials throughout. Walk to Museum Island, galleries, and Berlin's best restaurants.

title: Montmartre Artist Studio

reviews.text: Like stepping into a Toulouse-Lautrec painting!
Cozy and romantic. Hill is steep but worth it!
The view from the window is incredible.

description: Step into the bohemian world of Montmartre in this authentic artist studio. Once home to painters and poets, the space retains its creative spirit with original skylights and vintage furnishings. Steps from Sacré-Cœur.

title: Boutique Hotel in Covent Garden

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before

reviews.text: The attention to detail is remarkable.

description: Stylish boutique hotel in the heart of London's theater district. Thoughtfully designed rooms blend contemporary style with British heritage. Walk to world-class shows, shopping, and dining.

title: Modern House in Oud-Zuid

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 7 days before

reviews.text: Beautiful home near all the museums!
Pieter's bikes were a great bonus.
Spacious and stylish. Perfect for families.

description: Elegant townhouse in Amsterdam's upscale Oud-Zuid neighborhood. Contemporary Dutch design meets comfort. Steps from Vondelpark and the Museum District. Complimentary bikes for exploring the city.

title: Modernist Apartment in Eixample

reviews.text: Great location on Passeig de Gràcia.
Like staying in a Gaudí dream!

description: Experience Barcelona's architectural heritage in this beautifully restored modernist apartment. Original hydraulic tile floors, ornate ceilings, and Gaudí-era details preserved alongside modern comforts. Walk to Casa Batlló and La Pedrera.

title: Trastevere Townhouse

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 5 days before

reviews.text: Trastevere is magical! Lucia's home is perfect.
We fell in love with Trastevere!

description: Charming 17th-century townhouse in the heart of Trastevere, Rome's most bohemian neighborhood. Private rooftop terrace with views of church domes. Narrow cobblestone streets, trattorias, and nightlife at your doorstep.

title: Belém Waterfront Studio

houseRules: Don't miss the pastéis de Belém!

reviews.text: Nice studio, easy access to monuments.
The famous pastéis de nata are steps away!

description: Bright waterfront studio in historic Belém, home to Lisbon's most famous monuments and the original pastéis de nata. Watch ships sail by on the Tagus River from your window. Easy tram connection to the city center.

title: Vinohrady Wine Lover's Retreat
description: Charming apartment in trendy Vinohrady, Prague's foodie and wine lover's paradise. Tree-lined streets, art nouveau buildings, and the city's best restaurants at your doorstep. Short metro ride to Old Town.

title: Prenzlauer Berg Family Home

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 5 days before

reviews.text: Kids loved the Sunday flea market!
Our dog loved the nearby park.

description: Spacious family home in charming Prenzlauer Berg, Berlin's most family-friendly neighborhood. Walk to playgrounds, organic markets, and cozy cafes. Mauerpark's famous Sunday flea market is just around the corner.

title: Saint-Germain Luxury Apartment

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 7 days before

reviews.text: Marguerite's apartment is a work of art.
Anniversary trip couldn't have been better.
Like staying at a friend's incredibly chic home.

description: Exquisite apartment in the heart of Saint-Germain-des-Prés. Designer furnishings, antique accents, and modern luxury. Steps from legendary cafes, galleries, and the Seine. An unforgettable Paris experience.

title: Camden Creative Space

reviews.text: Camden is so fun! Great base.
Eclectic decor, perfect for the area.
Good value in a fun neighborhood.

description: Funky apartment in the heart of Camden, London's most alternative neighborhood. Colorful decor matches the vibrant market scene outside. Perfect for music lovers and those who want to experience London's edgier side.

title: De Pijp Foodie Paradise

reviews.text: Albert Cuyp Market is a must!
De Pijp is the place to be!

description: Stylish apartment in De Pijp, Amsterdam's most multicultural and foodie-friendly neighborhood. Steps from the famous Albert Cuyp Market. Iris provides a curated food tour map featuring hidden gems and local favorites.

title: Gràcia Village Hideaway

reviews.text: Gràcia feels like a village in the city!
Great apartment, easy walk to Park Güell.
The plazas at night are magical!

description: Cozy apartment in the bohemian neighborhood of Gràcia, where Barcelona feels like a small village. Charming plazas, independent shops, and local bars. Easy access to Park Güell and the rest of the city.
